entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 10:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: SE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Snow mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening then west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
